email_chain.subject: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

I hope you're doing well. We have the vessel OCEAN BREEZE available for a coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. The cargo size is 7500MT on CIF terms. The starting freight quote is USD 42.50 per MT. Laycan is 15-20 Oct. Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thanks for the quote. USD 42.50 seems a bit high. Can you do better? Also, can you confirm the vessel's DWT and LOA?

Cheers,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

The OCEAN BREEZE has a DWT of 85000 and LOA of 225m. I can offer a revised freight quote of USD 41.75 per MT. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

USD 41.75 is better. Can we push it to USD 41.00? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 16-21 Oct?

Cheers,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

USD 41.00 is possible. Laycan adjusted to 16-21 Oct. Please confirm.

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Cheers,
John

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: OCEAN BREEZE
- Cargo: 7500MT Coal
- Load Port: Newcastle
- Discharge Port: Shanghai
- Laycan: 16-21 Oct
- Freight: USD 41.00 per MT
- Demurrage: USD 18,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Summary of Terms - OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Looks good. Just one thing: can we confirm the loading window is 72 hours?

Cheers,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Summary of Terms - OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Yes, loading window is 72 hours. All other terms remain as per the summary. Let me know if you need anything else.

Best regards,
Maria
